health_issues.name: Common Cold
remedy: Boil 1 teaspoon of dried tulsi (holy basil) leaves in a cup of water.
Add a small piece of ginger and let it steep for 5 minutes.
Strain the tea and mix in 1 teaspoon of honey and a few drops of lemon juice.
Drink this tea twice a day to relieve cold symptoms.

health_issues.name: Acid Reflux
remedy: Mix 1 tablespoon of aloe vera gel with a cup of lukewarm water.
Drink this on an empty stomach to soothe acid reflux.
Alternatively, chew 4-5 fresh basil leaves after meals to reduce acidity.

health_issues.name: Headache
remedy: Crush a few fresh peppermint leaves and apply the juice to the temples.
Massage gently for 5-10 minutes to relieve tension headaches.
Alternatively, brew a cup of chamomile tea and sip slowly for relaxation.

health_issues.name: Indigestion
remedy: Chew 1 teaspoon of fennel seeds after meals to aid digestion.
Prepare a tea using 1 teaspoon of dried peppermint leaves in hot water.
Drink this tea twice daily to relieve bloating and indigestion.

health_issues.name: Sore Throat
remedy: Boil 1 teaspoon of turmeric powder in a glass of warm milk.
Add 1 teaspoon of honey and drink before bedtime.
Alternatively, gargle with warm salt water infused with crushed tulsi leaves.

health_issues.name: Cough
remedy: Extract fresh juice from basil leaves and mix it with a teaspoon of honey.
Consume this mixture twice a day to soothe a cough.
Alternatively, drink warm ginger tea with a few drops of lemon juice.

health_issues.name: Fever
remedy: Boil a few neem leaves in water and let it cool.
Drink this neem-infused water to help reduce fever naturally.
Alternatively, prepare a tea with giloy (Tinospora cordifolia) stem and drink twice a day.

health_issues.name: Constipation
remedy: Soak 1 tablespoon of flaxseeds in water overnight.
Drink the water and consume the seeds in the morning on an empty stomach.
Alternatively, consume 1 teaspoon of triphala powder with warm water before bed.

health_issues.name: Diarrhea

Drink this once a day to control diarrhea.

health_issues.name: Anemia
